feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-10T15:59:36.050467Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;LLM.int8()：大规模变压器的 8 位矩阵乘法（2022）</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2208.07339</id >; <updated>;2023-06-10T15:05:43.302392Z</updated>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2208.07339"/>; <author>; <name>;tosh</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tosh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse /0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：129px；" />;<br />;本文描述了 Transformer 中的 Int8 矩阵乘法过程，该过程将推理所需的内存减少了一半，同时保持了全精度性能。这是通过两部分量化程序 LLM.int8() 实现的，该程序包括矢量量化和针对异常值的混合精度分解方案。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llm-int8-8-bit-matrix-multiplication-for-transformers-at-scale-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36271112" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Palantir CEO 拒绝暂停 AI 开发的呼吁</stitle>; <id>;https://newsnotfound.com/palantir-ceo- rejects-calls-to-pause-ai-development-amid-global-debate/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T15:06:43.302951Z</updated>; <link href="https://newsnotfound. com/palantir-ceo-rejects-calls-to-pause-ai-development-amid-global-debate/"/>; <author>; <name>;newsnotfound</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=newsnotfound</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://newsnotfound.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/image-271.png " style="宽度: 220px; 高度: 220px;" />;<br />;Palantir 首席执行官亚历克斯·卡普 (Alex Karp) 拒绝了暂停人工智能开发的呼吁，并表示继续推进这项技术很重要。卡普认为，西方目前在人工智能领域拥有关键的商业和军事优势，不应放弃。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#palantir-ceo-rejects-calls-to-pause-ai-development" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36271120" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;展示HN：用600行C89编写的RISC-V核心</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/mnurzia/rv</ id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T13:58:43.303375Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/mnurzia/rv"/>; <author>; <name>;mnurzia</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mnurzia</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/d930687e51f592f51d4c69e017d8088a2f462e91ffc195d76dfa3eb0964ccd5f/ mnurzia/rv" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;转储一个从 0x80000000 开始的二进制文件，它可以由 rv 直接加载，如上例所示：不使用任何大于 32 位的整数类型，即使是乘法，因为它是用C89写的。以不完全符合 C89/99 的方式假定整数类型的宽度。很快就会修复这个问题，我正在研究一个防水的 <stdint.h>;;对于 C89。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-risc-v-core-written-in-600-lines-of-c89" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270150" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;许可对于解决人工智能风险既不可行也无效</stitle>; <id>;https://aisnakeoil.substack.com/ p/licensing-is-neither-feasible-nor</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T13:58:43.303789Z</更新>; <link href="https://aisnakeoil.substack.com/p/licensing -is-neither-feasible-nor"/>; <author>; <name>;headalgorithm</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=headalgorithm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1200,h_600,c_fill,f_jpg,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep,g_auto/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post -media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F4239d7c6-4f55-4254-91f2-20b9b2bec77e_1118x639.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：119px；" />;<br />;这篇文章讨论了将不扩散作为使 AI 更安全的一种方式的想法，但认为许可和执法将是困难且无效的。相反，作者建议学术界、公司和非政府组织组成的多元化团体应该开发和评估最先进的模型来应对人工智能风险。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#licensing-is-neither-feasible-nor-effective-for-addressing-ai-risks" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270303" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;风能制氢生产达到深水</stitle>; <id>;https://spectrum.ieee.org/green-hydrogen -离岸风</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T14:58:43.304183Z</更新>; <link href="https://spectrum.ieee.org/green-hydrogen-offshore-wind"/>; <author>; <name>;mfiguiere</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mfiguiere</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://spectrum.ieee.org/media-library/a-man-in-safety-helmet-walks-down-a-plank-from-a-yellow-wind-energy-platform-docked-to-the- shore.jpg?id=34017178&width=1200&height=900" style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;最近几周，第一批基于平台的电解厂已推向海外。欧洲各国政府已经在规划海上风能与氢能的联合开发。为了开始向海上转移，lhyfe 不得不缩减设备并提高可靠性。离岸优势是避免了在欧洲和日本等人口稠密的地方进行氢气生产的成本并允许延迟 - 他预计 2030 年左右将出现一个转折点。浮动风力发电可能是 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat .io/#wind-to-hydrogen-production-reaches-deep-water" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36270884" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;Golang 的最佳秘密：'可执行示例'</stitle>; <id>;https://bitfieldconsulting.com/golang/examples</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T14:58:43.304614Z</已更新>; <link href="https://bitfieldconsulting.com/golang/examples"/>; <author>; <name>;gus_leonel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gus_leonel </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/5e10bdc20efb8f0d169f85f9/1667998545795-U2LE9NW2BDTDQMCQZT3Q/lifebelt.png?content-type=image %2Fpng" style="宽度: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Go 提供了一个叫做可执行示例的功能，允许代码包含在自动生成的文档中，并以与测试相同的方式自动验证。这些示例是真正的 Go 代码，可以在中编辑和运行无需安装 Go 的网络浏览器。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#golangs-best-kept-secret-executable-examples" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270851" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;关于 Skimmers 的一切</stitle>; <id>;https://krebsonsecurity.com/all-about-skimmers/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T14:58:43.305043Z</更新>; <link href="https://krebsonsecurity.com/all-about-skimmers/"/>; <author>; <name>;cm_silva</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cm_silva</uri>; </author>;<content type="html">;<img src="https://krebsonsecurity.com/wp-content/上传/2010/08/wouldyou-300x217.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 160px;" />;<br />;这篇文章是关于 ATM 盗窃者、加油站盗窃者和其他相关欺诈设备的帖子集。作者展示了整个系列，并提供了一个方便的地方来参考所有这些故事一个地方。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#all-about-skimmers" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml: base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;联邦调查局：FISA 第 702 节“绝对关键”监视、犯错、保护美国人</stitle>; <id>; https://www.theregister.com/2023/06/09/fbi_fisa_section_702_absolutely/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T14:58:43.305508Z</更新>; <link href="https://www. theregister.com/2023/06/09/fbi_fisa_section_702_absolutely/"/>; <author>; <name>;rntn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rntn</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://regmedia.co.uk/2023/06/09/fbidudes.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;联邦调查局副局长保罗·阿贝特称美国《外国情报监视法》第 702 条对于该机构继续保护美国人“绝对关键”。然而，第 702 条在美国被滥用过去监视美国活动家、记者和其他人，并将在今年年底到期，除非国会更新它。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fbi-fisa-section- 702-绝对关键到间谍-on-err-protect-americans" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36270554" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;意外高频交易公司（2018）</stitle>; <id>;https://web.archive.org/web/20210205014443/https://meanderful.blogspot.com/2018/01/the-accidental-hft -firm.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T09:58:43.305924Z</更新>; <link href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210205014443/https://meanderful. blogspot.com/2018/01/the-accidental-hft-firm.html"/>; <author>; <name>;Twixes</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Twixes< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://web.archive.org/web/20210205014444im_/https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IvTrVTjUluA/WxvzieGw3oI /AAAAAAAAMSQ/Lz-dTYA9ahIdRdvSWfADXAaacdO11ehXwCLcBGAs/s320/DUO2qqwVwAIBXda.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 146px;" />;<br />;这篇文章是作者在高频交易方面的个人经历，包括为期权交易开发定价缓存和创建一个系统来应对 2 毫秒延迟挑战。作者还讨论了与困难的团队成员一起工作的挑战和行业政治。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-accidental-hft-firm-2018" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36269041" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Zig 语言服务器和取消</stitle>; <id>;https://matklad.github.io/2023 /05/06/zig-language-server-and-cancellation.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T06:58:43.306352Z</更新>; <link href="https://matklad.github. io/2023/05/06/zig-language-server-and-cancellation.html"/>; <author>; <name>;goranmoomin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= goranmoomin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://matklad.github.io/assets/zig-lsp.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 105px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了在为语言实现 LSP 时从可靠的数据模型开始的重要性，并探讨了在语言服务器中处理取消的不同方法。作者建议使用半空间垃圾收集方法来处理现在需要但将来不需要的内存。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#zig-language-server-and-cancellation" target="_blank">; [总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36268247" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;开源许可证是否涵盖忒修斯之船？</stitle>; <id>;https:// shkspr.mobi/blog/2023/06/do-open-source-licences-cover-the-ship-of-theseus/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T14:58:43.306770Z</更新>; < link href="https://shkspr.mobi/blog/2023/06/do-open-source-licences-cover-the-ship-of-theseus/"/>; <author>; <name>;edent</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=edent</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://shkspr.mobi/apple-touch -icon.png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;作者下载了一个带有归属许可的HTML模板，结果重写了75%的HTML，更改了61%的CSS，质疑是否还需要归属根据许可条款的原创者。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#do-open-source-licences-cover-the-ship-of-theseus" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36256325" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;表情符号厨房</stitle>; <id>;https://emojikitchen.dev/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T03:58:43.307180Z</updated>; <link href="https://emojikitchen.dev/"/>; <author>; <name>;smollett</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=smollett</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://emojikitchen.dev/social.png" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;组合表情符号的独特插图，在 Google 的表情符号厨房中制作，并在网络上全面提供 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#emoji-kitchen" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36267382" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;The Embeddable Common Lisp (2005) [pdf]</stitle>; < id>;https://ecl.common-lisp.dev/static/files/papers/ecl-1995-attardi.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T14:58:43.307594Z</更新>; <链接href="https://ecl.common-lisp.dev/static/files/papers/ecl-1995-attardi.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;andsoitis</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=andsoitis</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;该文章包含执行多值编程和生成随机数的 Lisp 程序的代码。该程序还包括一个对数计算函数。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-embeddable-common-lisp-2005-pdf" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270565" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;计算机图形行业起步于犹他大学</stitle>; <id>;https://spectrum.ieee.org/history-of-计算机图形行业</id>; <updated>;2023-06-09T22:58:43.308015Z</updated>; <link href="https://spectrum.ieee.org/history-of-computer-graphics-industry "/>; <author>; <name>;sohkamyung</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sohkamyung</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://spectrum.ieee.org/media-library/a-large-group-of-older-men-standing-for-a-group-portrait-some-sitting-on-chairs-in-front -and-others-standing-behind-them.jpg?id=34017358&width=1200&height=900" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;犹他大学通过 David Evans 和 Ivan E. Sutherland 在 1960 年代和 70 年代的开创性研究，在启动计算机图形行业方面发挥了重要作用。今天的许多计算机图形名人最初是在他们的公司 Evans and Sutherland 担任员工或博士生，在那里他们为计算机图形处理做出了基础性贡献。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-computer-graphics- industry-got-started-at-the-university-of-utah" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36264744" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text" >;Debian 12 “书呆子”</stitle>; <id>;https://www.debian.org/News/2023/20230610</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T12:58:43.308438Z</updated>; < link href="https://www.debian.org/News/2023/20230610"/>; <author>; <name>;聊天</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=聊天</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Debian 经过1 年9 个月28 天的开发，发布了新的稳定版本12，名为“Bookworm”。该版本包括 11,000 多个新软件包、更新的软件包以及对 ARM64 上安全启动的支持。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#debian-12-bookworm" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36269934" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;GitHub 被指控改变 Copilot 输出以避免版权指控</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theregister.com/2023/06/09/github_copilot_lawsuit/</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-10T13:58:43.308868Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theregister.com/2023/06/09/github_copilot_lawsuit/"/>; <author>; <name>;belter</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=belter</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://regmedia.co.uk/2019 /07/20/shutterstock_programmer.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：149px；" />;<br />;GitHub 被指控修改其 Copilot 编程助手，以生成与摄取的训练代码略有不同的输出，以避免版权侵权索赔。修改后的针对微软、GitHub 和 OpenAI 的投诉称，Copilot 违反了版权法和软件许可要求，对公开发布的代码进行培训并将他人的代码作为自己的代码提供。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#github-accused-of-varying-copilot-output-to-avoid-copyright-allegations" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270427" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;1973 年的毛基辛格会议</stitle>; <id>;https://gaodawei.wordpress.com/2023/06/08 /1973-prc-notes-on-mao-kissinger-meeting-of-february-17-1973/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-09T23:58:43.309293Z</更新>; <link href="https ://gaodawei.wordpress.com/2023/06/08/1973-prc-notes-on-mao-kissinger-meeting-of-february-17-1973/"/>; <author>; <name>;prude</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=prude</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://gaodawei.files.wordpress. com/2023/06/snap493.jpg?w=1005" style="宽度：220px；高度：133px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了外交关系解密文件在深入了解历史事件方面的重要性，特别关注 1973 年的毛泽东与基辛格会议。作者比较了美国和中国会议的边注，并指出了一些差异，包括毛主席政治不正确的笑话。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-mao-kissinger-meeting-of-1973" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36265771" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;4 名儿童在飞机失事后 40 天在亚马逊被发现还活着</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bbc.com/news/world-latin-america-65864158 </id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T12:58:43.309724Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.bbc.com/news/world-latin-america-65864158"/>; <作者>; <名称>;sjcsjc</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sjcsjc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/1024/branded_news/F31B/production/_130053226_4a94e355e06c9c99bb2f0c658192f6bbae2deb5a.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;四名年龄分别为 13 岁、9 岁、4 岁和 1 岁的儿童在飞机失事中幸存下来，他们的母亲和两名飞行员丧生后，在哥伦比亚的亚马逊丛林中被发现还活着。这些孩子属于 Huitoto 土著群体，他们失踪了 40 天，然后才被士兵和当地人参与的大规模搜索行动救出。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#four-children-found-alive-in-amazon-40-days-after-plane-crash" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270011" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;夜深人静，一场震耳欲聋的战争</stitle>; <id>;https://atmos.earth/exploring-evolution -of-bats-and-moths/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T10:58:43.310128Z</updated>; <link href="https://atmos.earth/exploring-evolution-of-bats -and-moths/"/>; <author>; <name>;meanie</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=meanie</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://atmos.earth/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/evolution-bats-moths-1280x853.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;博士。 Aaron Corcoran 研究蝙蝠和飞蛾之间的战斗，其中涉及回声定位、化学防御、声纳干扰、隐身追踪和声学错觉。这场冲突已经持续了数百万年，并导致双方都做出了显着的适应。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#in-the-dead-of-night-a-deafening-war" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36265734" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;接缝雕刻</stitle>; <id>;https://www.alanzucconi.com/2023/05/29/seam-carving/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T13:58:43.310503Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.alanzucconi.com/2023/05/29/seam-carving/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;马里乌兹</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mariuz</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www .alanzucconi.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/seam_wave_05a-1024x707.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：152px；" />;<br />;Seam Carving 是一种调整图像大小的技术，它有选择地删除信息量最少的像素，保留大部分细节。它是属于经典 AI 领域的上下文感知调整大小算法的示例。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#seam-carving" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;PlayHT (YC W23) 正在招聘一名高级机器学习工程师（法学硕士/生成模型）</stitle>; <id>;https://www .ycombinator.com/companies/playht/jobs/G6vI660-senior-ml-engineer-large-language-models</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T07:58:43.310873Z</更新>; <link href=" https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/playht/jobs/G6vI660-senior-ml-engineer-large-language-models"/>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://bookface -images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/3d4c9619438357f2137d8fd295cf819f695c073d.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;Play.ht (YC23) 正在构建未来的生成媒体平台；我们拥有业界最高质量的语音合成和语音克隆模型。我们正在寻找全职高级机器学习工程师加入我们，共同构建一个平台，让数百万创作者能够使用生成式 AI 来创作各种类型的内容。完美的候选人是一位可靠的自主工程师，在大型语言模型、生成模型和变形金刚方面具有成长心态和经验。最好是语音合成、GPT 和扩散模型知识。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#playht-yc-w23-is-hiring-a-senior-ml-engineer-llms-generative-models" target="_blank">;[总结]< /a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为了拯救 C，我们必须拯救 ABI ( 2022)</stitle>; <id>;https://thephd.dev/to-save-c-we-must-save-abi-fixing-c-function-abi</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T10 :58:43.311213Z</updated>; <link href="https://thephd.dev/to-save-c-we-must-save-abi-fixing-c-function-abi"/>; <作者>; <名称>;karsinkk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=karsinkk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// thephd.dev/assets/img/2022/03/Jason%20Turner%20(lefticus)%20-%20C++%20Weekly%20270%20-%20Title%20Screen.png" style="width: 220px; height: 124px; “ />;<br />;一些平台已经实现了应用程序二进制接口（abi）的稳定性。这背后的想法是允许不同的实现和实现策略来完成某些工作。如果我们将 dll 从代码下换出，尽管有中断，它仍会继续工作——即使启用了优化并且没有堆栈保护。未来会重写abi稳定性机制，使其更容易在其他平台上实现。但现在，我们<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#to-save-c-we-must-save-abi-2022" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36249253" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;资本化的仪式（2021）</stitle>; <id>;https://economicsfromthetopdown.com/2021/06/02/ the-ritual-of-capitalization/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T07:58:43.311609Z</updated>; <link href="https://economicsfromthetopdown.com/2021/06/02/the- ritual-of-capitalization/"/>; <author>; <name>;benaadams</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=benaadams</uri>; </author>; <content type= "html">;<img src="https://i0.wp.com/economicsfromthetopdown.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/ritual_capitalization.png?resize=600%2C450&ssl=1" style="width: 220 像素；高度：165 像素；" />;<br />;金融是一种以资本化仪式为中心的量化信仰体系，涉及将财产与金融混合以将其简化为数字。资本化仪式是资本主义意识形态的体现，并在人类行为中产生了惊人的规律性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-ritual-of-capitalization-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36267611" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;我对 Chrome 扩展程序提交过程的体验</stitle>; <id>;https://meetingdolphin.com/blog/chrome-extension-submission</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-10T09:58:43.311990Z</updated>; <link href="https://meetingdolphin.com/blog/chrome-extension-submission"/>; <author>; <name>;lcmchris</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lcmchris</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://meetingdolphin.com/images/SnippetPermissions.png" 样式="宽度：220px；高度：120px；" />;<br />;作者分享了他们在 Chrome 扩展程序提交过程中的经验，并将其与签证申请过程进行了比较。他们提供有关如何导航流程的提示和见解，并告知用户潜在的问题，例如自动更新和缺少回滚功能。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#my-experience-of-the-chrome-extension-submission-process" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36260906" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;腮腺炎病例 (2007)</stitle>; <id>;https://thedailywtf.com/articles/A_Case_of_the_MUMPS</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-10T09:58:43.312370Z</updated>; <link href="https://thedailywtf.com/articles/A_Case_of_the_MUMPS"/>; <author>; <name>;ahiknsr</name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ahiknsr</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://thedailywtf.com/images/alexp/apx-square500.jpg " style="宽度: 220px; 高度: 220px;" />;<br />;Bryan H 在“MUMPS 商店”工作了两年多，在那里他必须学习和使用 MUMPS 编程语言。 MUMPS 是一种用于创建和维护医疗信息系统的编程语言，其语法难以使用，其设计目标是创建永远无法再由任何人维护的代码。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-case-of-the-mumps-2007" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36268931" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;英国爱好者用“惊人”的新形状震惊数学世界</stitle>; <id>;https://phys.org/news/2023-06-uk-hobbyist-stuns -math-world.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T14:58:43.312748Z</updated>; <link href="https://phys.org/news/2023-06-uk-hobbyist- stuns-math-world.html"/>; <author>; <name>;mojomark</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mojomark</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://scx1.b-cdn.net/csz/news/800a/2023/the-spectre-one-of-the.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度: 126px;" />;<br />;来自英国的退休印刷技师大卫史密斯发现了一个名为“帽子”的 13 边多边形，它可以覆盖无限大的平面而不重复相同的图案，解决了 60 年前提出的问题。史密斯和三位数学家还发现了一种叫做“幽灵”的新形状，它可以永远持续下去而不会重复一种模式。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#uk-hobbyist-stuns-math-world-with-amazing-new-shapes" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270647" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;DDoS 保护</stitle>; <id>;https://docs.digitalocean.com/products/networking/ddos/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T13:58:43.313125Z</updated>; <link href="https://docs.digitalocean.com/products/networking/ddos/"/>; <author>; <name>;okozie</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=okozzie</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;DigitalOcean 推出了 DDoS 保护服务，通过监控提供针对 DDoS 攻击的持续保护并阻止对资源的恶意流量。该服务还包括 API 和 CLI 参考文档以及其他用于 DDoS 保护的工具。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ddos-protection" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36270348" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;一个学生想逃避考试的愿望导致了一种压缩算法</stitle>; <id>;https://www.quantamagazine.org/how-lossless-data-compression-works-20230531</id >; <更新>;2023-06-09T17:58:43.313535Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.quantamagazine.org/how-lossless-data-compression-works-20230531"/>; <作者>; <name>;the-mitr</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=the-mitr</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src= "https://d2r55xnwy6nx47.cloudfront.net/uploads/2023/05/CompressionExplainer-byKristinaArmitage-Lede-scaled.webp" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;研究人员正在开发新的有损数据压缩技术，以减少每天通过互联网传输的 90 亿千兆字节的信息量。然而，不牺牲任何物质的无损方法已经非常高效，并为许多标准图像和软件实用程序提供支持。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-students-desire-to-get-out-of-a-exam-led-to-a-compression-algorithm" target="_blank">; [总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36251471" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;入职反模式</stitle>; <id>;https://www.dcaulfield.com/onboarding-反模式</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T09:58:43.313932Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.dcaulfield.com/onboarding-antipatterns"/>; <author>; <name>;cauliflower99 </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cauliflower99</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章讨论了良好的入职体验对于新用户的重要性雇员，并提供了要避免的反模式示例。它强调需要明确的说明、实际任务和明确的目标，以确保成功的入职流程。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#onboarding-antipatterns" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36259679" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;Beamer、Dressman、Bodybag</stitle>; <id>;https://europeanreviewofbooks.com/beamer-dressman-bodybag/en?ref=thebrowser.com</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T13 :58:43.314314Z</updated>; <link href="https://europeanreviewofbooks.com/beamer-dressman-bodybag/en?ref=thebrowser.com"/>; <author>; <name>;silt</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=silt</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://europeanreviewofbooks.com/media/pages/ beamer-dressman-bodybag/en/714d5f7cec-1681763543/artboard-18@2x.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：140px；" />;<br />;这篇文章讨论了德英混合语 Denglisch 在柏林的使用情况，以及它如何影响这座城市的文化和语言。作者是柏林一家英语杂志的编辑，反思了他们自己与语言的关系以及迎合不同读者群的挑战。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#beamer-dressman-bodybag" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36265739" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
